pressRelease.title: EQ Works to Present at 2018 Cantech Investment Conference
pressRelease.excerpt: EQ's President and Chief Executive Officer Geoffrey Rotstein is slated to present at the Cantech Investment Conference at 12:10pm on January 31st, 2018 on the Paradigm Innovations Stage.

content.value: EQ Inc. (TSXV: EQ) (“EQ Works Inc.” or “EQ”), North America’s leader in location and behaviour data intelligence (“Location Behaviour”), announced today that the Company's President and Chief Executive Officer Geoffrey Rotstein is slated to present at the Cantech Investment Conference at 12:10pm on January 31st, 2018 on the Paradigm Innovations Stage.

The Cantech Investment Conference, now in its fifth year, will serve to connect approximately 3,500 investors with over 100 of Canadas preeminent technology companies. Areas represented at this years conference span a variety of topics, including Blockchain and cryptocurrency, artificial intelligence and machine learning, augmented and virtual reality, and security and marketplaces.
Mr. Rotstein and other members of the Company's Senior Management will be available for questions and updates on the Company's progress both before and after the presentation at Booth 405.

EQ Works (eqworks.com) provides a smarter way to target customers using Location Behaviour. Using first-party, location-based behaviour signals, advanced data analytics, and proprietary software, EQ Works creates and targets customized, performance-boosting audience segments. Proprietary algorithms and data, combined with Artificial Intelligence, generate attribution models that connect consumer behaviour in the physical world to behaviour in the digital world, helping solve complex challenges for brands and agencies.

1235 Bay Street, Suite 401
Toronto, ON M5R 3K4
Phone: 416.597.8889
